import React,{Component} from 'react' import '../css/navbar.css' import '../css/newNav.css' class Navbar extends Component { render() { window.onscroll = () => { const navbarHeight = document.getElementById('mainNav').clientHeight const smallLogoHeight = 31.5 const bigLogoHeight = 128 const smallLogoEndPos = 0; const smallSpeed = (smallLogoHeight / bigLogoHeight); const ySmall = (window.pageYOffset * smallSpeed); let smallPadding = navbarHeight - ySmall -34; if (smallPadding > navbarHeight) { smallPadding = navbarHeight; } if (smallPadding < smallLogoEndPos) { smallPadding = smallLogoEndPos; } if (smallPadding < 0) { smallPadding = 0; } document.querySelector('.small-logo-container').setAttribute("style", `padding-top: ${smallPadding}px`); } return ( <>
